Package Utilities

Class OutputUtils

java.lang.Object
Utilities.OutputUtils
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class OutputUtils extends Object implements Constants
Handles application output.

      Aligns text in the center of the terminal window according to Constants.TERMINAL_WIDTH.
      Parameters:
      text - the text to center.
      Returns:
      text with whitespace-padding on either side.
